body.name: VASAGLE Bathroom Floor Storage Cabinet, Bathroom Storage Unit with 2 Adjustable Shelves, Bathroom Cabinet Freestanding, 11.8 x 23.6 x 31.5 Inches, Forest Green UBCB060C01
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 6 mins
features: [Spacious yet Space-Saving] Sized at 11.8"D x 23.6"W x 31.5"H, this bathroom storage unit occupies a small footprint while offering lots of storage. With this unit, you can utilize your bathroom space to the max
[Sturdy, Stable, and Safe] Made of robust MDF, this bathroom storage cabinet is sturdy and stable; the anti-tip kit hidden on the back of this storage cabinet adds to the overall stability and safety
[Adjustable Shelves] This bathroom storage unit comes with 2 adjustable shelves (each has 3 heights) behind the doors, allowing you to organize both tall and short items and keep them away from dust

[Beautiful Addition to Any Room] Elegant green color, combined with unique beadboard-style cabinet, make a stylish storage unit that fits in easily with your home decor, whether it’s your bathroom, living room, or entryway
[Easy-Peasy Assembly] Never worry about assembly! Numbered parts and easy-to-follow instructions make this freestanding bathroom cabinet a breeze to assemble

Static Load Capacity of Each Adjustable Shelf: 33 lb (15 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Bathroom Floor Cabinet1 x Accessory Bag1 x Anti-Tip Kit1 x Instructions VASAGLE Notes: Children are not allowed to climb on or play with the product for safety.For safety, be sure to secure the storage cabinet to the wall with the included anti-tip kit.Do not expose the cabinet to water for extended periods of time to avoid cracking and deformation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little cabinet
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed. No chemical odor! Fit and finish were excellent. Well packaged - arrived without any damage. Instruction were OK. I really liked the idea of including extra pieces of hardware - even though I had no shortages. This is a high class company.I know some sweet young thing will say her hubby assembled it 15' - it took me about 3 hours. But I am 80 years old with failing eye. Assembly can easily be accomplished by one person.Design is OK for intended use, but this will not become a family heirloom to be handed down from generation to generation. Areas of weakness are the doors pivot on pins rather than hinges and the back is made of some kind of thin composite. Overall - a great little storage cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value! Super cute and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Really cute and easy. It probably won’t last forever but it is far nicer than the price would suggest.Check the dimensions- it was a bit smaller than I expected but it fits nicely so maybe I’m just bad at envisioning things in space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together but small for the big towels. Need just a little bit more space and depth and it would be perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, easy assembly, attention to details!
reviews.reviewText: 100% perfect for what I needed!I was surprised at the quality of the materials. I purchase a LOT of low price furniture pieces (over organizer and constant redecorator) and generally they come with issues. This is a solid piece.Pros:• those cardboard back pieces…yeah you’re getting one…but this one actually come in 2 pieces with a piece of plastic you slide each side into to become the middle support. It also comes with a notch cut out at the top to put the wall anchor through - as a mom, love this and wish all pieces came like this. That’s just attention to detail if you ask me.• The shelves are very sturdy. I have heavy bottles of epoxy resin on them and I have zero concern.• It looks NICE. This is an aesthetically pleasing piece. Personally, I’d prefer the doors to not have that faux paneling look, but after seeing it in person it’s growing on me.• I can vacuum under it…as a multi-pet home this is a MUST!• low to no tip over possibilities. The piece is sturdy and not easy to tip, but with the included wall anchor it eliminates that risk.Cons: (for me…but dependent on your needs)• I can’t use both of the included shelves. There’s not enough height to fit all the bottles if I use both. I would need an extra couple of inches. BUT, this isn’t a resin storage cabinet - it’s a bathroom storage cabinet. And fitting cleaning supplies, towels, hair care products etc in this would be a breeze.I could only think of one con.Reasons for buying:1) width: I need something less than 23” wide due to heating vent.2) doors no drawers: with a toddler in the house I wanted 2 doors so I could easily childproof the cabinet…resin and toddlers are not a good mix (nor resin and cats from experience!)3) color: I wanted white or navy to match my bedroom and this is true white

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Love everything about this cabinet. The color is perfect and makes a great pop of color in my bathroom. I searched hundreds of cabinets and knew this was the one the minute I saw it. The added storage space is just right and the quality is 5stars for sure. You can't go wrong with this cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I needed storage for a small bathroom and this works great .
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and very sturdy. I would recommend this cabinet. I needed something small for bathroom storage and this works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I figured this might have some scratches from shipping etc. Nope. It's perfect and stunning in my hallway. I need to get more items like this from this seller. Thank you for such a beautiful product. I got the dark grey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad, but not good either.
reviews.reviewText: The construction was as expected, not particularly sturdy, but good enough for what it is. It looks ok.CONS: I have two issues.The first, there is a plastic piece with two channels in it, it is the middle piece that holds the back panels together. It was too wide to fit in the slot that the back panels fit into, and at full height blocked the bracket that affixes the unit to the wall. I had to trim it to fit.The second, the knob holes which are pre-drilled in the doors are at different heights. It makes the entire cabinet look wonky. Extremely disappointed.If the doors were drilled properly, I'd recommend the cabinet, for the price. With the knobs at different heights, I wouldn't recommend the cabinet at any price. Good luck, maybe yours will not have the same issues.
Perfecto y fácil de armar no viene con herramientas pero si con la tornillería
Really easy to put together. Great purchase.
Easy to put together. Looks lovely. Perfect for the space.
Easy instructions. easy assembly, just had an issue with one piece of hardware.
This cabinet was exactly what I needed to organize my pantry since the storage space in my condo is so little. It was so easy to assemble, there was lots of space and it looks great!
